entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:38 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 9:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain and ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 20 early this evening then west 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
